title: glazed confit duck and Puy lentils
description: If you haven’t got the stamina to tackle the full recipes here, just pick and choose the parts you want to make. Shop bought pastry and confit duck would lighten the work.
ingredients: 15g table salt per kilo of duck legs
2 garlic cloves, peeled and finely chopped
250g/9oz cold butter, cut into small cubes
4 figs, peeled, cores removed, cut in half
200ml/7fl oz veal jus, or reduced beef stock
